Text: De Gyldne Laurbær:  The award is handed at a ceremony arranged by the publishing house which has published the winning book and by the Committee De Gyldne Laurbær.

Text: De Gyldne Laurbær:  The winner is usually one of the bestsellers among the Danish books.

Triplets:<De Gyldne Laurbær
9:
--------------------
<Text: De Gyldne Laurbær:  On the day when it is decided who wins the Golden Laurel, the president of the Committee of The Golden Laurel informs the winner about the award, while journalists follow the event.>
